author: daxian-dbw
body:
Fix #5307
Separate Install-PowerShellRemoting.ps1 from psrp.windows nuget package.
A new psrp.windows nuget package (beta.4) has been published to powershell-core feed. It doesn't contain the `Install-PowerShellRemoting.ps1` script.
title: Separate Install-PowerShellRemoting.ps1 from psrp.windows nuget package
